ProjectTitle: Degradation of CDK1 and HDACs as a strategy to treat T-cell malignancies
InitialFeedbackHistory:
05/01/2024
Data: please also list cells/biological materials in the data table, these are considered physical data, note that you may also need ethical registration/approval when working with human materials including cell lines, for more information see: https://research.kuleuven.be/en/associatienet/ethics/guidance/humanmaterial
Metadata: Will you collect metadata with your measurements? You also mention RDR in sharing where metadata will be added (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr/full-metadata-model), for more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata
Sharing: note that datasets receive an identifier (DIO) upon deposit in RDR
label: good with suggestions
